name: CRYSTAL SWORD
effect: Aura of Protection: a 30ft sphere surrounds the wielder. Those within the sphere take no damage from the storm. When within the storm the sword attacks with its energy profile.
description:
“There are two powers in the world; one is the women and the other is the pen. There is a great competition and rivalry between the two. There is a third power stronger than both, that of the sword.” - Muhammad Ali Jinnah
The architecture within the station loses coherence as we approach the center, be prepared to fight in impossible spaces.
“Those who play with the devil's toys will be brought by degrees to wield his sword. This is good, actually.” - R. Buckminster Fuller
“A blow with a sword strikes deeper than a blow with a word.” - Robert Burton

I will have to assume my imperfect form for this operation. I will only have the power to briefly assume my semi-perfect form.
“To become the sword you must think like the sword. That is the first step on the path” - Secare Impetus Luke 22:36
